categories: Category:Jedi Knights of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Rajan was a male Human Jedi who fought in the Army of Light during the end of the New Sith Wars. He had a black beard and a shaven head.
He served under General Kiel Charny on Ruusan, and was killed in the Sixth Battle of Ruusan after being trapped under a tree prior to the onslaught of the Sith Lords.
